snippet: With no obvious motive apparent, American investigators are considering a wide range of possibilities but caution that all remain merely speculative.
abstract: American intelligence and law enforcement agencies, motivated by strong suspicions of foul play, renew their search for any evidence that the disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 was part of terrorist plot; investigators have found nothing so far, and their efforts are being limited by Malaysia's refusal to accept large-scale American assistance.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and SCOTT SHANE

lead_paragraph: With no obvious motive apparent, American investigators are considering a wide range of possibilities but caution that all remain merely speculative.

headline.main: As U.S. Looks for Terror Links in Plane Case, Malaysia Rejects Extensive Help
headline.print_headline: As U.S. Looks for Terror Links in Plane Case, Malaysia Rejects Extensive Help
